title: New: NITE FIELDS – Come Down
content:
With their first non-live track, Brisbane trio NITE FIELDS show exactly what they’re capable of creating with the brooding stomp of Come Down.

Heavy and languid, it recalls memories akin to the likes of Jesus & Mary Chain, as well as touches of The Horrors recent shoegaze influenced material. Whilst NITE FIELDS may not be a household name yet, if they continue to conjure up pieces with as much composure and maturity as Come Down, then there’s no reason why 2012 can’t be their year.

Come Down is released via Lost Race Records on 9 January, limited to 150 copies.

Come Down by NITE FIELDS
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
